creator: TNTRELAX
descriptionHtml:
AFK Hero is a defense game in the form of a 1 vs 1 antagonism. In which players must perform agility skills to summon troops to fight enemies. Online games in which players fight directly in real time. Winning or losing is entirely up to the player.
-----------------
1, Introduction: It is a defense game in the form of conflicts between players around the world in real time. The game combines fast hand-to-hand and unique tactics. To win you must concentrate. Game is not for slow people!

2, How to play: The game has a simple way of playing. To summon soldiers to battle, you must select items that match the spell that appears on each soldier's head. You just need to select one of the three buttons Sword, Hammer, Stick in the bottom right of the screen to coincide with the image appears in the left corner on the screen. This is a series of combos and each type of soldier will have long or short summons to summon. When you enter the correct combo chain will revive the soldiers. If you select the wrong image you will be locked the selected button within 3 seconds. It is therefore important to focus on the correct, fast-moving button that is critical to winning the Hero Defense.

3, Functions: Game includes Army, Training, Arena Arena, Buy Ruby, Off Ads, Account

+ Army: The army in the Hero Defense is very diverse, with nearly 130 classes of soldiers and monsters full of attributes. In each level you will collect ruby. From ruby ​​you can buy soldiers to fight. Soldiers are purchased by default as your current Hero.

+ Training: Practice as well as get ruby. You can go to the Level area to play back the previous level and get more rubies from the bottom of the game if you win.

+ Arena: Arena arena is an area where you can play live with players all over the world. It is where you show off your reflexes and of course if you are confident enough about your ability you can enter the arena to challenge other players. The amount of ruby ​​earned at Arena Arena is very much. There you can add rubies to recruit more soldiers into your squad.

+ Buy Ruby: If you want to buy ruby ​​without the need to plow the level you can go to the Buy Ruby menu to buy ruby ​​with 2 very cheap price is 10000 Ruby for 1$, and 55000 RUBY for 5$. Once purchased you will receive ruby ​​right into your account.

+ Off Ad: Free games should keep TNTRELAX 20% ad rate after playing a game. This fee to maintain the game upgrade. If you find it annoying you can close it at the Turn Off Ads menu for 45000 VND. From then on, whatever account you play on any device will not show ads.

+ Account: This is the area where you synchronize your account locally on the device that connects to the TNTRELAX service. You can then play this account on any device that has the Hero Defense game installed.
-----------------
Features :
+ Gaming style combines a variety of tactics and agility skills.
+ Nearly 110 classes of soldiers and monsters.
+ Each class of soldiers or monsters has different special skills.
+ 1 vs 1 multiplayer real-time multiplayer mode is fun and exciting.
+ Continuously update and add new classes and characters.
+ Is a totally free game.
-----------------
Powered by TNTRELAX
